divs: Sighting DetailsI have talked to you guys before i don't think you guys can help me the rounb metal orb the size of a basket ball hit my buick olds mobile on my side of the door in the new mexico desert you had some one from new mexico right my e-mail but i lost that e-mail it happened in 1987 but it is really starting to bug me every day know plus the reptile being i saw i saw a show were you guyes went to the indian res in new mexico i need to talk to the shaw men of that trib they will know what i saw hit my car some one you guyes knows sombody knows i am getting closer to finding the truth the metal ball or orbe huvered like a dancer moving in and out of small desert shrubs i watched it for about a half hour it new i was watching it thats why it hit my car it new i saw it it had no sound it was like the wind i did some studing after exsperance ran in to magnetic frequincy removing mass i just need to talk to some one on the res please.
